SCTX:
Begin stal3Script

short stal3

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Earth == 20 )
	Journal BM_Earth 30
endif

Act_BM_steam_03->Enable
PlaySound "BM pipe medium"

if ( part == 1 )
	set stal3 to 1
elseif ( part == 3 )
	set stal3 to 2
elseif ( part == 7 )
	set stal3 to 3
else
	if ( part < 5 )
		set part to 0
	else
		set part to 6
	endif
	set Act_BM_pipe_01.stal1 to 0
	set Act_BM_pipe_02.stal2 to 0
endif

End stal3Script
